info.name: lawliettttttt's Theme
info.description:
- Background image (can be seen in timeline background too).
- Right sidebar and the search bar can only be seen when the cursor on them.
- Left sidebar menu names are invisible, only the icons can be seen.
- Scrollbar colour has changed.


Background image: https://www.deviantart.com/kamoondna/art/ergo-proxy-wallpaper-1-395284542
